## DropModule class

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Access this module by calling [ThirdwebSDK.getDropModule()](./sdk.thirdwebsdk.getdropmodule.md)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class DropModule extends ModuleWithRoles<Drop> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [ModuleWithRoles](./sdk.modulewithroles.md)<!-- -->&lt;Drop&gt;
